title: Razr
description: A fallen angel with a secret.An otherworldly elf with an insatiable hunger she doesn't understand.A cursed gem.Meet mortal enemies Razr and Jedda...and the priceless diamond that threatens to destroy them both even as it bonds them together with sizzling passion.Welcome back to the Demonica Underworld, where enemies find love...if they're strong enough to survive.
author: Larissa Ione
